```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r, eval=FALSE}

# make localy a copy of the repository at <url> 
git clone <url>

# edit <file name>
# show changes that were made during editing
git diff

# finished editing ...
# new version of the file that we want to save
git add <file name>
  
# now is the time to actually make the save
git commit -m "message"  

# combine the add and commit steps together
git commit -am "message"   

# status report on the repository
git status
```
